LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.FriendlyName.SmartStore.ShopConnector

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.SmartStore.ShopConnector

LocaleResource.Value: Shop-Connector

LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstructionImport
LocaleResource.Value: Create connections to Smartstore stores from which you want to import data. Ask the store operator for the required store URL, the public and the secret key.

LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstructionExport
LocaleResource.Value: Create connections to Smartstore stores for which you want to share your data.

LocaleResource.Name: AddNewImportConnection
LocaleResource.Value: Add new import

LocaleResource.Name: AddNewExportConnection
LocaleResource.Value: Add new export

LocaleResource.Name: EditConnection
LocaleResource.Value: Edit connection

LocaleResource.Name: UnauthorizedRequest
LocaleResource.Value: Access has been denied

LocaleResource.Name: ConnectionNotActive
LocaleResource.Value: Requests are not possible through this connection because it is deactivated.

LocaleResource.Name: ImportNotActive
LocaleResource.Value: Data import through Shop-Connector is deactivated. Please activate it under "General" if you want to import data.

LocaleResource.Name: NoContent
LocaleResource.Value: There was no data or information returned.

LocaleResource.Name: ShopConnectorAuthResults
LocaleResource.Value: Successfully authenticated;Authentication failed for unknown reason;Shop-Connector not available;Export through Shop-Connectoris deactivated;Request contains an invalid authorization header;The sent HMAC signature does not match the signature calculated by the server;The send timestamp is missing or has an invalid format;The sent timestamp deviates too much from the server time;The sent timestamp is older than the last request of the user;There is at least one message parameter missing which is required for security purpose;The sent content MD5 hash does not match the hash calculated by the server;A connection with the public key cannot be found;Connection is disabled;Public key is invalid;Incompatible version

LocaleResource.Value: One moment please... this process can take up to several minutes depending on the amount of data.

LocaleResource.Value: The import is being performed in the background now. You can view the progress in the import dialog at any time.

LocaleResource.Value: Importing products;Importing bundles, grouped and required products;Import categories;Initialize import

LocaleResource.Value: The import has completed. Please see the log file for further information.

LocaleResource.Name: NoImportFilesFound
LocaleResource.Value: There are no import files. Please retrieve data first.

LocaleResource.Name: ShowImportedProducts
LocaleResource.Value: Show imported products

LocaleResource.Name: UploadXmlFile
LocaleResource.Value: To upload an external XML product file drop it here or click.

LocaleResource.Name: PluginOutOfDateMe
LocaleResource.Value: Your plugin version is outdated. Please update the Shop-Connector plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: PluginOutOfDateHe
LocaleResource.Value: The partner uses an outdated plugin version and need to update it.

LocaleResource.Name: FileTooLargeForPreview
LocaleResource.Value: The import file of {0} MB is too large for a preview. Set the setting ShopConnectorSettings.MaxFileSizeForPreview to a higher value (in MB) if the preview should be displayed anyway (not recommended).

LocaleResource.Name: IsImportEnabled
LocaleResource.Value: Import activated

LocaleResource.Name: IsImportEnabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether it is principally (despite created connections) possible to import data from other stores.

LocaleResource.Name: IsExportEnabled
LocaleResource.Value: Export activated

LocaleResource.Name: IsExportEnabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether it is principally (despite created connections) possible that other stores can retrieve my data.

LocaleResource.Name: ValidMinutePeriod
LocaleResource.Value: Request time window

LocaleResource.Name: ValidMinutePeriod.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: For security reasons should the time at which the request was sent to the Shop-Connector differ not too far from the current server time. With this setting, you set this time window in minutes.

LocaleResource.Name: LogUnauthorized
LocaleResource.Value: Log unauthorized accesses

LocaleResource.Name: LogUnauthorized.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether unauthorized requests will be saved in the log list.

LocaleResource.Name: ImageDownloadTimeout
LocaleResource.Value: Timeout for image download

LocaleResource.Name: ImageDownloadTimeout.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the timeout for the image download per product in minutes.

LocaleResource.Name: EnableSkuMapping
LocaleResource.Value: Differing product SKUs

LocaleResource.Name: EnableSkuMapping.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Activate this option if you want to specify and export differing product SKUs.

LocaleResource.Name: EnableSkuMapping.ProductInfo
LocaleResource.Value: Specify different SKUs for this product to export them in a shop connector export instead of the default SKU.

LocaleResource.Name: EnableSkuImport
LocaleResource.Value: Import differing product SKUs

LocaleResource.Name: EnableSkuImport.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the different SKUs should be imported via the columns ClientSku1, ClientSku2, ClientSku3 etc. during a CSV product import. Please specify the domain without www.

LocaleResource.Name: Url
LocaleResource.Value: Store URL

LocaleResource.Name: Url.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the URL of the Smartstore store from which data will be imported.

LocaleResource.Name: PublicKey
LocaleResource.Value: Public key

LocaleResource.Name: PublicKey.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The public access key is provided by the operator of the store, which serves as the data source.

LocaleResource.Name: SecretKey
LocaleResource.Value: Secret key

LocaleResource.Name: SecretKey.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The secret access key is provided by the operator of the store, which serves as the data source. Please not disclose this key to third parties!

LocaleResource.Name: RequestCount
LocaleResource.Value: Requests

LocaleResource.Name: RequestCount.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Number of requests that have been made through this connection.

LocaleResource.Name: LastRequest
LocaleResource.Value: Last request

LocaleResource.Name: LastRequest.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Date of last request that have been made through this connection.

LocaleResource.Name: LastProductCall
LocaleResource.Value: Last product call

LocaleResource.Name: LastProductCall.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Date when product data was fetched the last time through this connection.

LocaleResource.Name: LimitedToManufacturerIds
LocaleResource.Value: Manufacturer limited

LocaleResource.Name: LimitedToManufacturerIds.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the manufacturers the connection is limited to.

LocaleResource.Name: Url.Validate
LocaleResource.Value: Please enter a valid URL to Smartstore store.

LocaleResource.Name: Action.About.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Retrieves informations about the data provider.

LocaleResource.Name: Action.ProductData
LocaleResource.Value: Retrieve products

LocaleResource.Name: Action.ProductData.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Retrieves the product data of the data provider and saves them on the server of your store.

LocaleResource.Name: Action.ProductImport
LocaleResource.Value: Import products

LocaleResource.Name: Action.ProductImport.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Imports products based on the data previously retrieved from the data provider.

LocaleResource.Name: Action.ImportLogFile
LocaleResource.Value: Import protocol

LocaleResource.Name: ConnectorVersion
LocaleResource.Value: Shop-Connector version

LocaleResource.Name: ConnectorVersion.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The version of the Shop-Connector plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: StoreCount
LocaleResource.Value: Number of stores

LocaleResource.Name: StoreCount.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Number of stores, which are administered under the Smartstore installation.

LocaleResource.Name: StoreName
LocaleResource.Value: Store name

LocaleResource.Name: StoreName.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Store name of the data provider.

LocaleResource.Name: StoreUrl
LocaleResource.Value: Store URL

LocaleResource.Name: StoreUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Store URL of the data provider.

LocaleResource.Name: CompanyName
LocaleResource.Value: Company name

LocaleResource.Name: CompanyName.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The company name of the data provider.

LocaleResource.Name: UpdatedProductsCount
LocaleResource.Value: New or updated products

LocaleResource.Name: UpdatedProductsCount.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Number of products that were added or updated since your last fetch.

LocaleResource.Name: StoreDateTimeUtc
LocaleResource.Value: Time of the shop

LocaleResource.Name: StoreDateTimeUtc.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The current system time of the store in coordinated universal time (GMT\UTC).

LocaleResource.Name: FetchFromDate
LocaleResource.Value: Fetch from

LocaleResource.Name: FetchFromDate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the date from which to retrieve product data, i.e. include only data that have been updated or created after. Blank means retrieve all data.

LocaleResource.Name: DataFileName
LocaleResource.Value: File name (optional)

LocaleResource.Name: DataFileName.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Name of the file (optional) with the product data. The current date is always prepended due to sorting.

LocaleResource.Name: FilterManufacturerIds
LocaleResource.Value: Filter manufacturers

LocaleResource.Name: FilterManufacturerIds.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the manufacturers for which product data should be retrieved. Blank means get product data of all manufacturers.

LocaleResource.Name: FilterCategoryId
LocaleResource.Value: Filter category

LocaleResource.Name: FilterCategoryId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the category for which product data should be retrieved. Blank means get product data of all categories.

LocaleResource.Name: ImportFile
LocaleResource.Value: Data to be imported

LocaleResource.Name: ImportFile.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The file with the data to be imported.

LocaleResource.Name: ImportCategories
LocaleResource.Value: Import categories

LocaleResource.Name: ImportCategories.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether to import categories. If this option is disabled, all products are assigned to the shop connector category.

LocaleResource.Name: TaxCategoryId
LocaleResource.Value: Tax category

LocaleResource.Name: TaxCategoryId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the tax category used when creating new products.

LocaleResource.Name: UpdateExistingProducts
LocaleResource.Value: Update existing products

LocaleResource.Name: UpdateExistingProducts.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether to update existing products.

LocaleResource.Name: UpdateExistingCategories
LocaleResource.Value: Update existing categories

LocaleResource.Name: UpdateExistingCategories.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether to update existing categories.

LocaleResource.Name: DeleteImportFile
LocaleResource.Value: Delete import file

LocaleResource.Name: DeleteImportFile.hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the import file to be deleted after a successful import.

LocaleResource.Name: Publish
LocaleResource.Value: Publish

LocaleResource.Name: Publish.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies to publish new imported products.

LocaleResource.Name: DisableBuyButton
LocaleResource.Value: Hide buy button

LocaleResource.Name: DisableBuyButton.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether to hide or to display the buy button. The value will be imported if it was not specified here.

LocaleResource.Name: DisableWishlistButton
LocaleResource.Value: Hide wishlist button

LocaleResource.Name: DisableWishlistButton.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether to hide or to display the wishlist button. The value will be imported if it was not specified here.

LocaleResource.Name: ShopDomain
LocaleResource.Value: Shop domain

LocaleResource.Name: ShopDomain.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the shop domain (without www), e.g. smartstore.de. The SKU specified here is exported if the domain matches the shop URL of the connector connection.
